name: Deal Acceptor
description:
just a  simple and very short text-based game. 

tip: 1. press space just after the text stop  to prevent bug to occur

        2. do not press z or x before "accept or reject" text appears to prevent bug

        3. if text just loops back around that means two things, you get the ending or bug occurring, actually, if you got the ending the text loops back around anyway. if a bug occurring well restart the game.
